div.p: >> FACTOR FOLLOW UP SEGMENT TONIGHT, THE OBAMA

ABOUT THEM. THEY COULD DIE.

STARTED IN THE BUSH ADMINISTRATION.

AND THEY HAVE BEEN ABLE TO PROSECUTE GOING FORWARD.
ILL. >>

ALL THE EMAILS AND HARD
COPY. >> Bill: RIGHT.
IT'S HARD TO GET AROUND. THAT'S WHAT'S HAPPENING.
NOW, STORY BREAKS, 20 PHONE LINES AND AGAIN, THEY

YOU ARE CHECKING PEOPLE
OUT.

ON ITS GROUNDS OF
